title: DRY Code Cleanup - Remove duplicate code and dead code
description:
Removed ~3,860 lines of duplicate/dead code across 3 phases:

Phase 1: Removed duplicate dashboard builders (builder.py + builder_sdk.py) and legacy template files (~2,900 lines)
Phase 2: Extracted secret backends to plugin system with lazy loading (~90 lines net reduction)
Phase 3: Removed deprecated reslayer demo functions (~869 lines)

Improvements:
- Single dashboard builder (builder_sdk.py)
- Modular secrets package with lazy-loaded cloud backends
- Cleaner demo.py without redundant CLI commands
- All 322 tests passing
